result.eng: The author uses diagrams a lot.
result.ga: Baineann an t-údar an-úsáid as léaráidí
result.orig: Baineann an t-údar an-úsáid as léaráidí
result.html: Baineann an t-údar an-úsáid as léaráidíThe author uses diagrams a lot.
result.ponchtml: Baineann an t-údar an-úsáid as léaráidíThe author uses diagrams a lot.

result.eng: The author makes a reference to a specific case.
result.ga: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leith
result.orig: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leith
result.html: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leithThe author makes a reference to a specific case.
result.ponchtml: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do ċás ar leiṫThe author makes a reference to a specific case.

result.html: Is ise údar an leabhairShe is the book's author.
result.ponchtml: Is ise údar an leaḃairShe is the book's author.

result.eng: The life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí
result.orig: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí
result.html: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibríThe life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ġaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ġnáṫoibríThe life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.

result.eng: It is a big cause for hope for the future.
result.ga: An-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea é
result.orig: An-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea é
result.html: An-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea éIt is a big cause for hope for the future.
result.ponchtml: An-údar dóċais don dtoḋċaí is ea éIt is a big cause for hope for the future.

result.eng: Have you read everything these authors have written?
result.ga: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seo
result.orig: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seo
result.html: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seoHave you read everything these authors have written?
result.ponchtml: Ar léiġ tú gaċ ar scríoḃ na húdair seoHave you read everything these authors have written?

result.eng: What does this tell us about the author?
result.ga: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údar
result.orig: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údar
result.html: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údarWhat does this tell us about the author?
result.ponchtml: Cad a insíonn seo dúinn faoin údarWhat does this tell us about the author?

result.eng: I find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ga: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.orig: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.html: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'ÉireannachI find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ponchtml: Ní údar náire domsa a ḃeiṫ i m'ÉireannaċI find my being Irish no cause for shame.

result.eng: Who is the author of this exceedingly valuable work?
result.ga: Cé is údar don saothar sárluachmhar seo
result.orig: Cé is údar don saothar sárluachmhar seo
result.html: Cé is údar don saothar sárluachmhar seoWho is the author of this exceedingly valuable work?
result.ponchtml: Cé is údar don saoṫar sárluaċṁar seoWho is the author of this exceedingly valuable work?

result.eng: He drove slowly and carefully. Not without reason, as he was tired.
result.ga: Thiomáin sé go deas réidh Ní gan údar mar bhí sé tuirseach
result.orig: Thiomáin sé go deas réidh Ní gan údar mar bhí sé tuirseach
result.html: Thiomáin sé go deas réidh Ní gan údar mar bhí sé tuirseachHe drove slowly and carefully. Not without reason, as he was tired.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiomáin sé go deas réiḋ Ní gan údar mar ḃí sé tuirseaċHe drove slowly and carefully. Not without reason, as he was tired.

result.eng: They wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.
result.ga: Ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éigin
result.orig: Ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éigin
result.html: Ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éiginThey wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éiginThey wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.

result.eng: I know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.html: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam go maiṫ go ḃfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.

result.eng: The re-unification is not the root of all evil.
result.ga: Ní hé an t-athaontú údar gach oilc
result.orig: Ní hé an t-athaontú údar gach oilc
result.html: Ní hé an t-athaontú údar gach oilcThe re-unification is not the root of all evil.
result.ponchtml: Ní hé an t-aṫaontú údar gaċ oilcThe re-unification is not the root of all evil.

result.eng: For many reasons, this country is divided into two states.
result.ga: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deighilte ina dá stát
result.orig: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deighilte ina dá stát
result.html: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deighilte ina dá státFor many reasons, this country is divided into two states.
result.ponchtml: Ar a lán údar tá an tír seo deiġilte ina dá státFor many reasons, this country is divided into two states.

result.eng: I will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ga: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.orig: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.html: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ a ḟios agam ansin an ḃfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.

result.eng: The reason for that is that it was out in the country.
result.ga: An t-údar leis sin ná go raibh sé amuigh i dtuath na tíre
result.orig: An t-údar leis sin ná go raibh sé amuigh i dtuath na tíre
result.html: An t-údar leis sin ná go raibh sé amuigh i dtuath na tíreThe reason for that is that it was out in the country.
result.ponchtml: An t-údar leis sin ná go raiḃ sé amuiġ i dtuaṫ na tíreThe reason for that is that it was out in the country.

result.eng: We believe it for a reason.
result.html: Tá údar againn lena chreidiúintWe believe it for a reason.
result.ponchtml: Tá údar againn lena ċreidiúintWe believe it for a reason.

result.eng: Whatever my reason for it was...
result.ga: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leis
result.orig: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leis
result.html: Cibé cén t-údar a bhí agam leisWhatever my reason for it was...
result.ponchtml: Cibé cén t-údar a ḃí agam leisWhatever my reason for it was...

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon údar agamsa lena ċeapaḋ naċ raiḃ aiṫne acu ar a ċéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
